name: The HIVE
description: Welcome the HIVE, Honeybees! ♥️ We're one of Aether's oldest and most treasured 18+ nightclubs.

Tonight, enter into the honeycombe and get lost in the sweet aroma of a first class, night time experience complete with a fully stocked bar of honey delights, sweet dancers, lustful courtesans, and a casino almost as addictive as treats from the host, Honey Bee, herself.
comments: Might be swapping Tuesday to Friday soon. Check back in soon.

name: The Nest
description: The Nest is a long running night club with a full bar, live music, tarrot reading and courtesans. The Nest location is also avaialble for rental!

name: Vibe House - Fight Club
description: Fight club with betting and prizes, and offers courtesans.
Our main feature is fights on the hour, bidding for fights for a change to win Gil, and an opportunity for fighters to make profit if they win the victory match.
Every 50k bid towards a fighter, win or lose, will count as ONE entry into our raffle. We raffle off a custom weapon every night with 1-2 additional prizes, favoring mounts.

name: Eden Hall Hostess Club
description: Modeled after a traditional hostess clubs, Eden Hall allow our hostess to allow you to relax after a long day, come in for a drink, and some great company.

name: House Catboi
description: We're a community of male-loving-male focused LGBTQ+ gamers serving the gay community of Eorzea both through this Discord community and our venue! Of course everyone is welcome! While we are primarily a community of male-loving-male identifying folks, everyone is welcome to take part in what we have to offer and to join the party!

name: The Drunken Moogle
description: Need a place to chill and relax after a long day of grinding? Want a hot supper, or a stiff drink? Look no further than the Drunken Moogle! Food, Drinks, Music, Events, & Much More!

name: Pickle Barrel
description: Seeking a place to mellow out and just be yourself? Care to talk away with friends while knocking back a few cold ones with company? Perhaps you just want to drink your troubles away? Either way you go about it, you are more than welcome at the Barrel!

name: Memory's End Tactus Anyder
description: SFW Public, NSFW Private Bath House. This Complex was built to cater to all the roleplay needs of the community, and as such, on behalf of staff, consider this your home as much as ours.

name: Memory's End Osculum Anyder
description: NSFW Brothel, Bar, & Lounge. This Complex was built to cater to all the roleplay needs of the community, and as such, on behalf of staff, consider this your home as much as ours.

name: The Twilight Moon
description: Fae inspired venue with live music from the Twilight Moon Quintet, and featuring an array of talent including DJs, bards, bands and macro-dancers! The Twilight Moon is the home of the Twilight Moon Quintet.

name: House of Seoul
description: House of Seoul is a swanky little (SFW) After-hours Jazz Lounge located in the ❤️ of Shirogane on Faerie. We wanted to bring the world of Jazz and ALL music in general to passerbys. Believe it or not my muse was 'Lo-Fi Jazz Cafe meets Cowboy  Beebop' 😂. You'll have to see for yourself 😉. We also have a cozy cafe area in the main lobby and an Art Studio-esque setup in the loft upstairs. Our recently added services include an On-Site Artist for live portraits! We also have an On-Site fortune teller! So if you're into the mystic arts and curious about what your future has in store then please seek out the mysterious Lady Clea on your next visit. So drop in and share a drink and vibe with wandering minstrels practicing their arts. You bring your Soul and we bring the vibes!

name: The Painted Rose
description: The Painted Rose is an Alice in Wonderland themed brothel! We invite you to celebrate your night and week with us and enjoy a range of fun and wonky little cocktails! Not to mention the wonderful host of company our courtesans may provide for you!

name: Lilting Lilium
description: We are a bar and lounge, allowing connections to various vendors in Eorzea supplying various services. Please come by for a drink and to mingle. Should you have any needs, please see our vendor list for possible fulfillment or reach out to the Madame for recommendations. Services: Bar, Duty Roulette, Tarot Readings, Photography, Housing Decoration, Crafting, Gathering, SFW RP and NSFW RP services, Wedding Reception, Arena, Bards for Hire, Artists for Commission.
notices: Monday and Thursday every week. Saturday every other week.

name: Lyn's Corner
description: Deep in the Goblet there's a little cafe. A small place to gather and relax or a quick visit just for a cup of coffee. My door is open for anyone to visit.

name: Wanderers Wayrest
description: A place for weary travelers to come at the end of their day-to-day journeys and find that oft-desired culmination of rest and relaxation. To fill their stomachs with delicious foods, to find the open and welcoming arms of the denizens within and to rejuvenate their mind, and body with a much needed massage. The Wayrest is an 18+ RP focused establishment, and we are more than happy to have you as a patron and feel privileged to have the chance to serve you.
comments: Novelty is massages work up to ERP style massages

name: Luxuria
description: Nestled by the trunk and under the boughs of Senna's Pride in Lavender Beds, the Luxuria provides a high class experience for its discerning guests and clientele.  Live music and DJs play within their halls to entertain their guests while their bar serves all manners of drinks from every corner of the twelve.  Hidden away from the eyes of the guard, its escorts provide warm companionship and warmer intimacy to their clients, taking them on wild adventures greater than anything Eorzea has to offer.  Won't you come and find your happiness within?

name: Under the Moonlight
description: Nightclub offering SFW and NSFW RP services, a fully stocked bar, casino with dice, astro slots, death rolling and blackjack, giveaways, nightly raffle, photography and art services.

name: The Anti
description: The Anti is a SFW Roleplay encouraged focused Lounge with quality interactions and libations. Our charming staff and atmosphere will have you entertained deep into the night with a wide selection of activities. Try your luck at one of our raffles, enjoy the melodies from our live bard and musical guests. If chatting is not up to your liking, anyone is welcome to just kick back and enjoy the night in our carefully planned out layout, the choice is yours at The Anti.

name: The Solstice Equinox
description: Welcome to The Solstice Equinox! Known first and foremost as a legacy FC "Sol Nova". We have been around since the 2.0 Launch of ARR! Now with our new high end night club that changes its theme according to the seasons. You'll be sure Eorzea is on the watch for! We guarantee you will enjoy your stay with us at The Solstice!  Hope to see you soon and show us that You've Got Sol!

name: A Bookstore
description: Welcome to a bookstore! You appear to have stumbled into a random bookstore, with quiet librarians in a dark, warm cozy setting. Shelves line the wall, littered with books from different ages, varying in genres. Throughout your exploration of the small library, small noises can be heard faintly from beneath the floor but the librarians pay no attention to them. Suspiciously, an old window panel lays near the entrance, almost out of place as the librarians can be caught glancing at them every now and then.

name: Red Moon
description: Red Moon is an LGBTQ+ 18+ RP venue that focuses on an immersive, welcoming environment for all to come and enjoy themselves. We've been operating since July 25th, 2020. Our mission at Red Moon is to provide a service to the community - whether it's the Red Moon community itself or the venue-going community as a whole. We want to provide a place for people to come to where they'll feel welcomed, noticed and loved.

name: Full Moon
description: Aether's premier lottery clubhouse offers BIG JACKPOTS every Saturday Night! Are you feeling lucky? Full Moon offers a variety of "fun activities", including those which appeal to the more sinful patron and whether it's a refreshing Mentor Mojito or a playful Bahamut Bellini, Full Moon offers high quality beverages for you to indulge in.

name: Silver Garden
description: The Silver Garden is an open social space for small or large events, or for simply hanging out. RP is welcome, but not required. Feel free to come and chat, or just mingle.

name: Succubares Insomnium
description: Succubares Insomnium is proud and delighted to offer travelers of the dusty road a multitude of entertainment to help you unwind. We feature live bands to get your blood pumping, 3mil. max-bet gambling (with the best odds in Aether!), and a spa with courtesan services available.

name: Love by Snu Snu
description: Love by Snu Snu Spa and Motel is a romantic and fairy themed bath house with curated private rooms available to rent. Hot tubs, showerbeds, love couches and feet soaking physical/metal therapy chairs are arranged for destressing and relaxing. Public bathroom with powder and make-up kits available for free use.
Love by Snu Snu also has a separate small venue within it:
The Rubdown (Room 5 of venue): Nature themed massage parlor with 3 different services available from our massage therapist; Clothed Massage, Naked Massage and Table Shower. (open during venue hours)

name: Club Foxbury
description: Looking for a place to pregame before a night of venue crawling?  Looking to test your glamour abilities with themes voted on by patrons in our weekly glam contest?  Looking just to blow off some steam with a good drink and some dancing?  The Foxbury is your place to go as your early evening destination!

name: Sugar Rush
description: Join us for sweet treats, live music and the comfiest experience you'll find!

name: ChocoKisses
description: ♡ ♥️ Maid Cafe ♥️ ♡ offering custom polaroid shots with your personal maid's signature on them, lovely performances from or adorable maids, yummy, high-quality foodies to share, and amazing songs from our bard-san.

name: Duality
description: Come on in and choose your style for the night! With our upstairs for your modern clubby night! And downstairs for your jazzy and classy night! Upstairs is an open stage. If no one is there, show us what you got!

name: Playboy Mansion
description: Welcome to PBM! The place where all of your appetites will be sated every Wednesday and Saturday night. The Playboy Mansion is a night-club with a fully-stocked bar, casino upstairs, and a host to a number of live twitch-DJ's and bands for your enjoyment. Looking for something more? Our extremely talented and beautiful staff are always available and eager to please! Don't miss out on an unforgettable experience and come join us for our next opening!

name: City Pop Night Club
description: Your one stop location for good vibes and beach parties. We specialize in providing a comfy night club experience that features a live dj with every session. Immerse yourself in the sick underground beats or find solace in the cool oasis of the beach with your friends and loved ones!

name: NeXus
description: Welcome to Nexus, we strive for excellence in customer service. We offer a variety of services and entertaintment ranging from Live Music, Tarot Readings, Talented Sketch's, Geisha's and a Full Service Bar. We hope you enjoy your stay with us and look forward to meeting you! Feel free to contact us for events and all your needs!

name: Forgotten Sonata
description: Welcome to Forgotten Sonata! With a relaxing atmosphere, wonderful live music, and a fully stocked bar, we look forward to getting to serve and know all our current (and potential) patrons! Feel free to stop by for our photobooth partner, Misty Shores, and nightly raffle for different prizes each night!

name: Grimm King's Hollow
description: For a night of upper class taste with fresh food and drinks we invite you to experience all the Grimm King's Hollow has to offer, if your tastes are more of the flesh variety our lovely courtesans will fulfill your desires.

name: Berry's
description: Berry is that natural entertainer in your friend group - where no day is the same when you’re around them. Berry now brings you Berry’s - a venue you can only explain through having experienced it, and no week is the same.
It’s very much the same eclectic, random, creative, and humorous personality you’ve come to know from the owner.
So, come and relax on a Friday night with Berry, in a premium burger bar environment, with our trivia and glam contests (and ofcourse live music and an open stage on the side)!

name: The Gates
description: The Gates is a small venue originally created by the official Free Company of the Delta Fighter Wing Gaming Community, The Fated, as a side project for fun.  Now a dedicated venue, our staff will do their best to serve your every need and provide the most relaxing experience possible!  Whether you seek casual RP, something a bit more focused, or even just a fun hangout, we do our best to provide!

name: Primal Rib Alehouse & Eatery
description: Fed up with silent venues? Hoping to connect with others but scared to try? Missing out on some Chaos in your life? Say no more and queue up at the PRAE! (Primal Rib Alehouse & Eatery) Our eastern inspired eatery & lounge has a little of something for everyone: BBQ service with delicious meats and treats, a myriad of thematic corners to relax and unwind, hot springs to soak in, and a fun friendly staff waiting to serve!

name: The Rose Petal
description: A spritely nightclub tucked away in the Lavender beds. The menu is focused on a variety of cocktails to compliment the welcoming atmosphere, and there's an open stage allowing any and all to perform. Stop by for drinks, you wont be disappointed!

name: Bliss Boba Cafe
description: Bliss Boba Cafe is home for avid connoisseurs of pearly delights. Come rest your weary feet at our shop and partake in some delectable drinks, delicate pastries, and soothing music. Our special menu also includes a personalized piece of artwork corresponding with their order for our customers!

name: Club Radiance
description: Club Radiance is a chill and friendly little place for adventurers to dance and chill and vibe with us! We offer drinks, music, bards, horrible jokes, positive vibes  and occasional events meant for some light-hearted fun! Saturday 12am-4am EST is when we're fully active, but everyone is welcome to vibe with us on other days 10pm-4am EST! Come rest your weary souls with us, travelers. ♥

name: Moodlift Cuddle Corner
description: The Moodlift Cuddle Corner is the late night, ultra-romantic, home of warm and soft things. Like stepping inside a marshmellow. Soft, cozy, sweet.

name: Bella's
description: This establishment is Bella's personal home. Guests are invited to spend their morning and early afternoon at Bella's to meet others, relax, and enjoy a complimentary breakfast. There is no set schedule, but the house is generally open on weekdays between 8am - 2pm CST. Be on the lookout for the Party Finder or join the Discord to get announcements for openings!
notices: This venue is usually open at the below times at the discretion of the owner, it is not a fixed schedule. Please check the discord's announcements channel before visiting. 😉

name: The Golden Kettle
description: Come relax at the Golden Kettle and enjoy teas from all over Hydaelyn!

name: Tabby's
description: Tabby's is your one stop fits all solution to having a good time with your friends! There are 3 floors dedicated to providing you with different hangout spots including a reading room, bath house, cozy attic and downstairs venue with gamblin, drinks, music and more! Come make yourself at home!

name: Trionfi
description: Eorzeans look for a solace. Their own little spot in the corner of the world to just get away from it all. Sometimes a regular club just won't do it for them. Some folk need a bit more intimacy. That's what Trionfi is for. With a cozy atmosphere, the jazz lounge and bar is one of the few spaces in Eorzea where one can vent to a stranger, relax a bit and chill out with close friends in a smaller setting.

name: ATTIKA
description: A very warm welcome to the Attika community! ATTIKA is a classy nightclub and lounge where you can find dancing, live music, a mouth-watering selection of beverages, and even more so staff.

name: Mortar and Thistle Pharmacy
description: Visit for medical consultations, be it roleplay or IRL. We can help with a basic diagnosis of issues and offer treatment recommendations to help improve your quality of life.
Check Party Finder on the weekends to see if we're open or message Jack Anders @ Cactuar for appointments.

name: Flora and Fana
description: Greetings and welcome to the Flora & Fana Cafe. Glad to have you with us! Please feel free to take your ease in our lovely hot tub, sit with friends and grab a bite, play Triple triad, or even perform on our open stage. Enjoy your stay!

name: Cozy Catsual
description: A small cafe on the beach front of Shirogane, for those looking to relax and enjoy the moment. Feel free to come by and chat. Food and Drinks are served here.

name: Vaguely Lewd
description: Vaguely Lewd. Vehemently Lazy. Very Loud. VL for short.

We're a hangout first, a venue second. Every small thing about VL is run for fun and with hilarious little qwerks that'll have your belly aching for hours. You can only experience them by visiting, experiencing and paying close attention. ;)

Started and opened by Kai Hitaki as a solo project with support from her second half Akina Crimson, VL was created with relaxation in mind. A place where you can be social and not have to worry about anyone judging you. Come and chill with us. ♥
The venue layout changes every few weeks and you can influence the theme via regular votes in the discord. We also regularly hold contests!
With this hangout, we really recommended to keep those eyes open.

name: The Laundry
description: Just a laundromat and adult bar and lounge.
Come get dirty while your clothes get clean*.
We're a very open group of people and like to snuggle while we gamble and play games like Truth or Dare.
* Cannot guarantee clothes will be clean when you leave. 😀

name: The Kitty (Cafe and Lounge)
description: The Kitty Cafe and Lounge is a SFW venue located in the heart of the Mist on Jenova.  Sporting a cozy cafe upstairs, with fine dining and a water garden downstairs, our establishment offers cuisine, commodore and conversation!

The owners Sava and Azerith met one fateful day outside of Sava's Apt building in Shiro.  As it turns out, we were neighbors!  We kept bumping into each other, and became friends.  Sava had dreams of owning a cafe, and when she told Azerith this, on a whim Azerith said "Well, why don't we start one together?"  Thus began this fun little project!

name: The Glass Pumpkin
description: The Glass Pumpkin is an Aether venue looking to celebrate the XIV community. Our goals are to make new friends, have a great time and keep those serotonin levels riding high! Every month we will announce one "special" event filled with tons of fun and prizes! But we are also open regularly every Friday! We host raffles and give aways so be sure to stop by and sign up for those goodies! We cater to both RP and non-RP communities, don't be shy drop on by!

name: Rumors
description: Rumors is an Electronic Nightclub partying by the beach in Mist. We cater to all guests and are an LGBTQ+ friendly venue. Join us for drinks, dancing, raffles or if you really feel like spreading RUMORS why not chat up one of our very talented courtesans? Let's have some fun tonight!

name: The Heavenly Hearth
description: Welcome to The Heavenly Hearth, a quaint and exclusive Eorzean-style tavern, situated in the port city of Kugane. Offering the unique taste of Aldenard's cuisine to Far Eastern shores, enjoy the variety of food and specially-crafted teas and beverages with the company of fellow adventurers. Our hostel and private suites also offer comfortable lodgings for our guests.
We look forward to your visit!
[ SFW Immersive RP ]
Active and friendly RP community, welcoming both new and veteran roleplayers!
Non-roleplayers are also welcome to visit, and enjoy the ambience!
comments: Novel service is able to rent RP rooms.
RP heavy venue; speachmarks via /em and OOC via brackets only.

name: The Crimson Lotus
description: Hingan themes, black and red, hot baths, hot ramen, and hot girls. The Crimson Lotus' goal as a venue is to be somewhere that you can come to relax and be more than another face in the crowd. Rather than entering a venue where everybody is congregated on the dancefloor doing their favorite bee style dance, you can expect to find an environment that encourages social interaction over everything else.

Come hangout at our bar and enjoy some of our eastern themed food and cocktails, or make your way upstairs to do some close-knit gambling with one of our world famous dealers that offer games such as Heaven or Hell and Cho-Han.

Doesn't sound like your cup of Doman tea? The Crimson Lotus also offers plenty of areas to relax while listening to one of our extremely talented bards and a full double-tiered bath area that is sure to inspire even the most experienced g-poser while you soak and relax with friends.
Didn't come with anybody? The CrimLo offers a full range of hosts, hostesses, and courtesans to fulfill all of your SFW and NSFW needs and desires.
Come stop by and find out why this is one of the fastest growing venues on Aether. You're sure to remember the Crimson Lotus and they're sure to remember you when you come back in for a second visit!

name: Brewed Dreams
description: Welcome to Brewed Dreams! Looking for a place to just relax/afk? Maybe grab a quick drink or bite to eat? Come hang with us we’d love to have you!

name: Vibe Check
description: Vibe Check is a nice, relaxing pub tucked away in Midgard. Open for both a good time and a long time, you can come here and pick up a few drinks to start your night, or stop off at the end and settle up with a relaxing herb or two. Check it out the next time you decide you'd like to forget your worries and just settle down for a bit!

name: The Hallowed Grounds Cafe
description: The Hallowed Grounds Cafe; faeries evening community hang out where peopole can get away from the hustle and bustle of the every day, with a focus on coziness and relaxtion.  Featuring jump puzzles, an open stage and seasonal events, it's a perfect evening curl up spot. ♥

name: The Oaken Tavern
description: Tired of a long day of adventuring? Looking to sit back, relax, and enjoy some great food and better company? Come visit the Oaken Tavern, a sfw venue and open social space to make new friends and find like minded Warriors of Light to play with. Open and welcoming to players of all backgrounds, we ask that you try to extend that same courtesy to our other guests.

We're glad to have you, our tavern boasts a fully stocked bar, an open Stage for performing bards, and a cozy interior to help melt the weariness away. For More information, please visit our discord server and check out our website!

name: The King's Bounty Cabaret
description: In the Kingdom of Troia, a place most Eorzeans have never heard of, let alone been to, sits a pub only accessible to those with a writ of membership.  This place is the King's Bounty Pub, and it has withstood the test of time.  Uniquely adorned with three thrones upon its stage, this pub has entertained with vivacious shows and beautiful women for generations.

Nearby the Kingdom of Troia is another virtually unheard of Kingdom to Eorzeans:  The Kingdom of Baron.  It is from this kingdom our proprietor hails from.  After spending nearly five years in Eorzea for reasons all his own, he has also built a venue similar to the pub he remembers from his homeland.

Enter The King's Bounty Cabaret.  Our goal is to entertain the masses by providing an upscale establishment, top notch entertainment, and the best staff to be found on all of Aether.  Come vibe with our DJ, see live performances, dance with your friends, try our signature drink, or perhaps spend some quality time with some of our more specialized associates.  Be treated like royalty when under our roof, but remember to act the part of a dignified and benevolent ruler.  We look forward to serving you!

name: Beelzebabes Den
description: Hell's comfiest, yet naughty, establishment available for all to enjoy!

We provide a tonne of extra services to boost the already comfy but lively experience you'll get at Beelzebabes, including live music, dances, photography, courtesans, pillow services (SFW courtesans) and gambling!

name: Pixieberry Cafe
description: Pixie themed cafe with tarot readings and a hangout spot!

name: Bass Bumpers
description: A Fun Social Night Club Environment you won't soon forget!

name: Eden's Corner
description: ★ Welcome to  Eden's Corner! ★

Eden's Corner is a dark, floral Nightclub/Lounge that offers a variety of services such as a fully stocked bar, an in-house DJ, bards, a dancefloor and much more! We welcome all to an atmosphere where you can be yourself and let go~
Eden's Corner. Your home away from home :)

name: The Hideaway Cafe
description: So you've finally made it! Grab a drink! The show starts soon. Welcome to the Hideaway Cafe! A Corner venue meant for all venue workers to come, relax, and kick their feet up. Dueling piano Bards try to outwit each other each night, and drinks served in our Speakeasy set up are cold, and very fairly priced. So fill your cups and empty your heavy coffers after a long day's work, here at The Hideaway! Enjoy your escape.

name: The Drunken Croak
description: The Drunken Croak is a rustic tavern with friendly staff and a cozy atmosphere. Our goal is to create a welcoming community in which everybody can feel at home. The venue features a portrait artist, tarot readings, holiday events, a bath house and live music. Home of the best poutine in Eorzea. If comfy is your vibe, then make sure to pay us a visit!

name: Bae domain
description: A new and chill atmosphere Cactuar, run mainly by bunny girl!

A lot of bunny girls and bunny boys like to hang out at the venue, but everyone is welcome! We also have NSFW and SFW dancers if someone needs companionship. Our specialty drink is bunny milk, and we have egg nog and Hot chocolate made from bunny milk.
If you want to feel extra special become a Bae VIP, offering you use of our VIP booth, 50 minutes of dancing per week, use of our bathhouse and free bunny milk!

name: Aetherlife
description: Tucked away in the exotic eastern lands of Shirogane, right off the beach, the Aetherlife nightclub brings life to the night. Providing the dark, throbbing, underground night life that Ethyris needs. Aetherlife offers live music and DJs, exotic dancers, alluring courtesans, professional artists, and a fully stocked bar for all your partying needs. Home of Jenovas only designer cocai- I mean bathroom!

name: The Syndicate
description: Welcome to the Syndicate!

From our fully stocked bar to our gamblers retreat we have something for everyone. Supporting local bard bands and Twitch DJ's we keep the party alive. Looking to have a more intimate night? Our lovely experienced courtesans can give you an experience unlike any other.
Try your hand with any of our services and we promise you'll leave with a smile.

name: The Underdark
description: SFW Tavern and Sauna with an Open Stage and a Dark Ambient Atmosphere. AFK Friendly, Stay as long as you'd like.
Meals and Readings do not have a set price and are offered to be paid as you wish.
All foods are sourced locally and prepared by hand in front of you.

name: The Moogle Lounge
description: The Moogle Lounge is a great place where you can party till you can't no more or sit back and relax a bit. There is a bar full with a diversity of meals and drinks for you to enjoy, also there's the Nighty Night Raffle were you can win cool stuff!! Come join us to have fun, and have a break from those adventures of the day!  We are more than glad to have you here with us KUPO!
comments: Open at 7:55pm AST (they do not have daylight savings so do not migrate times)

name: Crossroads Conversations
description: When you're lost and don't know where to turn next, you arrive at the Crossroads.  Take your time to rest your feet, have a bite to eat, and enjoy in the fellow company of travelers.   Find a friend and then pick up where you left off, ready to discover where you're meant to explore next.

This diner is designed for the first time RP'ers. Engaging you in 60-90 minute immersive RP dinner parties encouraging character development, introducing new people, and building friendships before discovering new venues to experience!

name: Entropy Maid Cafe
description: Our story is simple starting with a desire to have a comfortable and welcoming place to go to relax and enjoy a good chat, the name was decided since everything is a disorder, but here we unite the disorder to give some peace to some of our clients.
Entropy Maid Cafe offers a comfortable atmosphere with kind maids and butlers eager to help you relax! Come alone or bring a friend to chat with us!
We are a SFW establishment that strives to put your comfort and relaxation first

name: Bone Zone Cafe
description: Our staff consists of the chill, fun-loving free company: Skeleton Warriors (BONES).
We pride ourselves on enjoying what the game has to offer whether it be leveling a job, raiding, crafting or simply the company of others.

name: Inveritas. A place far and near.
description: We all have our perspectives caused by different backgrounds, environments, and events in our life. Inveritas, so the "The untruth" or "the lying things" symbolize a place where the "truth" is nothing than a lie to the another. A Tavern for adventurers for their stories to tell, sit down, relax, and show their perspective. As truth is subjective, so is home. So come and feel at home on this long life journey.
notices: Inveritas will be 1.5 hours late opening tonight due to events in the real world! See you at 10:30 EST!

name: The Blue Moon Bistro
description: A café in The Lavender Beds, with a staff dedicated to quality and a calming atmosphere.

name: Dead Space
description: Dead Space offers an upscale clubbing and gambling experience with adult entertainment, live DJs, a busy bar, and experience courtesans for all tastes. We are LGBTQ+ friendly. Special events held regularly, so check the discord for what’s coming up!

name: Atlantis
description: An LGBTQ+ Friendly, All-Inclusive FF14 Venue! Come relax. get a drink, dance, and have fun with our courtesans~

name: Maple Bear Tavern
description: The Maple Bear Tavern is a Medieval tavern-style RP venue ran by the esteemed Sunbear. It is an establishment proudly offering camaraderie, fine fare, music, and never-ending ale!

name: Amaurot's Utopia
description: Welcome to the golden days of Amaurot. Never was a casino more magnificent. From the humble slots, to the heighted blackjack, she fairly gleems.
Take a break from peace and contentment, let your soul live for the moment.
Give into want, and let our creation magics provide you with an entertainment gaming experience like no other.
So pray not to primals, but to lady luck, as we weave reality to provide you a premium entertainment gaming experience, like no other.
So come enjoy life as an Ancient, and "remember" the pleasures of Amaurot's Utopia.

name: The Gold Roller
description: The Gold Roller would like to welcome you to a premium casino and club experience! Our casino floor offers a variety of games such as slot dice, roulette, and blackjack. We also host a High Roller Bar for those who enjoy the finer things in life!
Join us on our lower floor for a night of dancing, tarot, our Rainbow Bar and our resident DJ.
Other services include: Photography, Courtesans, Personal Dances, High Roller Club Membership, In House Bard Band!

name: Miqo'fe Cafe
description: Miqo'fé is an LGBT+ owned café run by a tight knit staff. Our goal is to provide a comfortable, chill atmosphere for anyone to come in and hangout with some warm food and drinks.

name: Lavender Latte Cafe
description: Welcome to our cafe. We are a Cafe specializing in providing a relaxing experience for a wide range of tastes.

name: Noire
description: Noir is a high end night club brought to life by Lana Cakes, Megumin Diff, Julius Helstea, and Bell Waters. The club sits perched above the ocean, where you will spend your nights with us. We have many courts to choose from, drinks and food to order, and the ability to fill your gambling needs. We can't wait to see you here 😉

name: Hamburger Nina's
description: Hamburger Nina's is Eorzea's most intimate yet flambouyant LGBTQ+ RP venue. Come in for drinks, food, and fun! Our bar and club has something for anyone looking for a night out, whether that be cozy or wild. ;)

name: The Baker's Bakery
description: Warm cozy bakery with fresh baked goods offered in dine in or take out. Our staff always ready to serve you with their best smile. Our open bard stage welcomes anyone who wants to charm us with their melody.

The Bakery was founded with the love of Tuya and Lanna and the desire to provide a cozy and relaxing atmosphere to travelers from every corner of the land. Allowing them to rest with the best apple pie in Eorzea.

name: The Canopy Cafe
description: Coffee cups in the shade of leaves

name: The Naked Dive
description: Welcome to the Naked Dive!

We're Aether's local Dive Bar that houses the BDSM community. People from all experience levels in BDSM are warmly welcomed as we continue to grow as a community and as an individual in knowledge, skills, and experiences. So grab a drink, take in the scenes and explore your wild side.
CHEAP DRINKS, RAD VIBES!

name: Dewdrop Café
description: A casual café to hang out in and have a good time! No need to order anything.
location: Faerie, Lavender Beds, Ward 13 Sub, Apt 40

name: The Lucky Lounge
description: Satisfy your desire for luxury at the Lucky Lounge. Tantalize your taste buds with fine dining, or feast your eyes on our angelic pole dancers. Relax in our hot tub, or the upscale balcony. If you want something a little more intimate, ask about our private dance menu. Many and more delights await you at the Lucky Lounge.
location: Cactuar, Lavendar Beds, Ward 17, Plot 5, Room 3

name: Sanctus Musica
description: Aether's most upscale live music venue owned and operated by the band Purrfection.

name: The Loveless Bar
description: "Infinite in mystery is the gift of the Goddess. We seek it thus, and take to the sky. Ripples form on the water's surface. The wandering soul knows no rest."
- Loveless ACT II

The Loveless Bar is a 18+ venue open on every Tuesday and Thursday 8pm-12pm EST! Enjoying fellow patrons and friendly employees, head downstairs for some unique drinks and dancing with our live music, join our gamble table to test your luck or have fun and get some good photos taken at our venue! Test your luck with our unique trivia night event and win some great prizes starting from 25k gil or join our raffles for great items!

name: Celestial Body
description: Find your home among the stars at Celestial Body, an 18+, LGBTQIA+ friendly nightclub catering to both SFW and NSFW roleplay. Our venue offers a variety of services - courtesans, tarot readings, photography, and gambling, to name a few - but what we truly pride ourselves on is our welcoming, lively atmosphere. Veterans and newcomers alike can find something special under our stars' glittering expanse!

name: Cats Meownge
description: The Cats Meownge was created for all Eorzeans to enjoy! From the social butterflies to those just looking to enjoy the scenery!
We pride ourselves on being a unique, delightful, and old fashioned venue themed around one of mans best friends, CATS.
Owned by Artyc Rose and Managed by Katsuki Bakugou, Skamos Firebrand, Felix Lock, & Jax Strife.

name: The Chocobo Den
description: The Chocobo Den is a NSFW speakeasy venue located in the Brimming Heart of the Goblet, offering a more cozy and homey atmosphere than your typical nightclub venue. At the Den, every guest matters, and we have something for everyone. Stay beautiful, Eorzea, and kweh on!

name: Milk Nightclub
description: Milk is an 18+ nightclub with a variety of amenities.
Enjoy our high energy dance floor or feel free to relax in our many lounge areas.
If you are looking for more privacy, be sure to explore our many room options as well!

name: Kiki's Bath House
description: Come relax at Kiki's Bath House after a long night out... We have drinks, refreshments, lovely ladies, and of course, baths.

name: Bottoms Up Nightclub
description: A premier Nightclub on Adamantoise. We welcome all and work to make a safe and inclusive space for Aether's LGBTQIA+ RP community.
We also open the first Sunday of every month for events, keep an eye out in our discord!

name: Onamazu Sushi bar
description: Do you find yourself wanting to catch your breath from the frantic and restless pace of daily life?
Nestled in the lush island of Kugane, tucked away in an unmarked corner stands a small cottage retreat where you may easily find yourself spirited away.
Onamazu not only offers the distinct and savory taste of Hingashi's finest delicacies.

Onamazu is also home, even to the most foreign stranger. Hide away and forget tomorrow if only for a night at Onamazu, and bask in the company of good people, who have also walked through its doors in hopes of laughing away their troubles, mending their pain, and meeting new friends. All while being enticed by beautiful courts, the deep lustre of gold at the gambling corner, and mouthwatering Far Eastern cuisine.
Forget expectations and let yourself just be.

name: Seven Circles
description: (+18) (LGBTQ+) Seven Circles nightclub prides itself on being a friendly and safe space for all walks of life. We feature a full selection of lovely dancers, live music, half priced special drinks, SFW and NSFW services for all your desires. Special additions include an in house photographer and artist! Come join us and sin the night away!

name: Wishbone Race Cafe
description: Wishbone Race Cafe is a SFW Racing themed venue were visitors can either bet on races or race themselves to win prizes. However if racing isn't  your thing you could always relax in the bath or enjoy the fine food served by our lovely chocobolic hostess.
comments: Novel service is partaking in or betting on chocobo races.

name: Club Vamp
description: Eorzea's spookiest LGBTQ+ NSFW dance club. Offering raffles, fully stocked bar, frighteningly fun staff, and a crazy fun dance party with a blood pumping alternative dance playlist curated by Club Vamp staff.

name: The Kitty Kashpot
description: Welcome to the Kitty Kashpot, a wonderful new home for all of your gambling needs. Built by friends, for friends, we pride ourselves on being the fairest gambling attraction on Aether! Come test your luck, bring your lapcats or your Lucky bunn and have a night you're sure not to forget!

name: The Birdhaus
description: Welcome to The Birdhaus! We are a SFW, immersive roleplay noodle bar and cafe located in Limsa Lominsa's Mist residential district first ward at plot 58!  Join us every Sunday, Monday and Friday from 6pm-9pm Central for welcoming atmosphere, friendly faces, music and amazing Doman and Far East inspired dishes! We also offer raid consumables, master recipes and omnicrafting services if needed.

name: Club Envy
description: If you're looking for a place to enjoy great drinks, great people, and great fun, or just to relax at the end of your night, look no further, we're always ready to party the night away!
Drinks, Food, Courts, Professional Photographers, Online Casino Games, Great Music on a private stream, Dancers, and a raffle!
Envy Live stream will be featuring popular EDM and Dance music!
LGBTQ+ Owned and Operated.

name: The Eagle
description: The Eagle is Eorza's premier leather bar! 18+ and LGBT+ owned and operated!

name: The Step Cafe
description: A relaxing pastel themed café with lots comfortable seating and a lovely outdoor patio to enjoy everything this small getaway in the Lavender Beds has to offer.

name: Somdaze Rest
description: Just a casual (sfw) place to unwind after a long day of battling the evil eikons of our lands... and beyond. Have a meal or just a drink. Listen to bard performances or maybe you feel like dancing. If you need to learn what tomorrow holds, you will find Isooni, our tarot reader, at her divine spot in the southwest corner.
Need some meditation time? Visit the rooftop garden! You will find a koi pond among lush greenery and a hot tub. The visit is sure to soothe your weary soul.
All of Eoreza's bards are welcome to get some stage time. We have an open stage policy, with a house band to fill in the gaps.
We will strive to provide excellent service, good food, and a relaxed atmosphere. No gimmicks, no strings, no pressure.

name: The Last Carrot
description: The Last Carrot is the next level in the dining and bar experience. You won't have to wait long in our lavish seating area for a host to take you to your table. Or you can venture right on up to The Last Carrot bar and indulge yourself in the hoppiest of drinks. Sit back and relax to the in game music or tune in to our DJ rocking those LoFi beats to ease away your day.

name: The Vanaheim
description: Somewhere near the intersection of Sexy Avenue and Groovy Street, there's a quaint hotel called "The Vanaheim". It's wood panels and leather, brass fixtures and fine art. The cocktails are craft, other vices are plentiful. All around you people of all walks and varieties smile and laugh, dance cheek-to-cheek, cheer their fortunes and share in lively banter. And filling every corner of the space is the most moving, eclectic, jazzy, and hip-swinging music you've ever heard. Pull up to the bar, warm yourself by the fire, or cut up the dance floor...the night is yours when you're at "The Vanaheim"! And oh, what a night it's going to be!

The Vanaheim is an 18+ RP-focused space offering specialty food and drink, gambling, themed event nights, richly-detailed roleplay, and a Live DJ (who interacts in-game!). We also host The Speakeasy Spa: a gorgeous bar and spa-bath aftervenue next-door in apartment #82. Ask about private rentals anytime!

name: The Velvet Room
description: The Velvet Room is an LGBTQIA+ friendly space where everyone is welcome & accepted. We are built on the belief that everyone deserves to feel safe, loved, and appreciated. TVR is a place where people can come to dance, mingle, relax, and party! We offer both SFW and NSFW services as well as host some of Aether's best DJs! Come visit us and you are sure to NOT be disappointed!

name: The Underworld
description: We offer live music, drinks and a lounge experience to our guests! Lounge a while in our hot tub, or dance your cares away to our bard!

name: Cafe Musashi
description: Named after our adorable mameshiba, Musashi, Café Musashi is run by a lovely couple. Located on a beach front, we provide a relaxing environment for our patrons and serve freshly made food! Our café is inspired from the show, Restaurant to Another World. Please do feel free to visit! We would love to have you.

name: CLUB DIABLO
description: Welcome to Club Diablo!! Come and enjoy the Eorzean Night Life with us every Friday, Saturday, Sunday. Enjoy routinely scheduled Live DJs via Twitch stream, trained RP/ERP courts and dancers along with nightly raffles, a club casino and a fight club. Visiting with Friends or having special events? Feel free to check out our VIP Packages. Hope to see you soon!!

name: Treehouse
description: Treehouse is a bar and bathhouse that offers a warm, welcoming, atmosphere for a fun, SFW RP experience. Live music is our specialty, and our stage always has a talented bard or band upon it!

name: Club Emeraude
description: Welcome to Club Emeraude! Emeraude is a nightclub, bar, lounge, and sauna with lots comfortable seating and private enjoyment rooms with a lovely outdoor patio to enjoy everything a beachfront getaway the Mist has to offer.

name: Petrichor Coffee-Bar
description: Petrichor Coffee-Bar is an all-inclusive and relaxing space for those looking for a wonderful time. It has a wonderful café aesthetic, and friendly staff that is available for all sorts of chat and aid. Our aim is to provide a pocket of tranquility to all Eorzeans.

name: VLVT DRMS
description: VLVT DRMS is a safe for work dance venue and bar lounge, lavishly decorated with a cozy and warm atmosphere to both entice and relax even the weariest of wanderers. We strive to bring a safe, calming space into our wonderful community, hoping that each visit will leave you in the clouds! Whether you're looking to grab a few drinks, make pleasant conversation or dance the night away, there is a member of staff that is eager to spend their time dreaming with you. Come dream with us tonight!
To enter the venue use /doze next to the desk. To exit the venue jump on the floor lamp.

name: The KAY
description: Enjoy your stay at The Kay! Sit back, relax and grab some snacks,, because we're here for a fun time, not a long time. Here to please your ears with gentle and kind conversation. (Brashness may apply)

name: Desert's Refuge
description: Desert's Refuge is a SFW, lore-heavy RP tavern located in Ul'dah where adventurers and other characters that find themselves in the desert city can visit to escape the unforgiving environment and meet other characters.

You find an unassuming poster advertising Desert's refuge amidst countless advertisements in Ul'dah promoting the most lavish of inn rooms for millions, cures for incurable diseases, and taverns with fees to even enter.
Thirsty? We have drinks.
Hungry? We have food.
Just want some shade from the sun? Sure. Come on in.
No Brass Blades!

name: AE Café
description: A subsidiary of The Aether Entertainer, hoping to provide a comfortable place to read, relax, or chat with the press staff. The cafe' was created with the intent of promoting The Aether Entertainer press and the featured venues or individuals each publication. During opening events, we hand out the latest newspaper early and serve warm beverages and baked goods. Since the topics we cover are ever-changing, so too will be the themed events we host here!
notices: This venue is open every OTHER Wednesday night. Please check the venue's Discord for opening.

name: The Enchanted Fae Cafe
description: A cafe set in a faerie-inspired world of fantasy and wonder.
Come relax with a cup of coffee or tea, a pastry or desert, and prepare yourself for a world of enchantment.
This venue is open stage! Come show off your barding skills atop lovely waterfalls.
Food and drinks have no set price and are offered to be paid as you wish.
We have an extensive menu of delights for you to choose from! Come sate your sweet tooth with a confection or pastry and a fresh barista-made drink!

name: BlueBird
description: Sit and focus while enjoying the ambience of a rooftop lounge.

name: Genie Bottle
description: We are a SFW club that has a calm and cozy atmosphere with fresh made drinks and friendly service.

name: 4S
description: Welcome to 4S a place where you can party till either you pass out or the DJ passes out!!! Come join us for a drink at our bar and enjoy one of our Seasonally named drinks. We have live DJs weekly as well as Game Masters on hand should you be feeling a bit lucky. We also have our lovely courtesans who would love to get you to know you.

name: Déjà Brew
description: Déjà Brew is a couples cafe ran by Momoko Miki. We serve people who want to go out on a date with their loved ones, and supply dates to the ones alone~ No one walks out sad from Déjà Brew! You must be 18+ to indulge in any romantic activities

Gposes, dates, meals, VIP memberships, dungeon runs with our lovely staff, raffles, and more. We have wonderful guest appreciation events like guest of the month, who wins a month of free VIP which includes 1 free date a week with your fav staff member and free meals on the house once a day for you and your partner, raffles to run maps or content like mount farms or trials to bond with the Déjà Brew Crew!

We just want a wholesome loving community where everyone can feel loved. We enjoy making you smile, and want to do our best to make sure you leave Déjà Brew loved, that way your trip to Déjà Brew becomes Déjà Vu when you keep coming back for more!
Events included, like raffles to go on map runs with the Brew Crew for you and a date, mount farming, and movie nights! So come on down to Déjà Brew♥
comments: Novel because it provides a date if you don't have one.

name: Yuukimura Teahouse
description: A small relaxing traditionally inspired teahouse, nestled in the heart of Limsa. Fresh beverages and sweets along with a serene atmosphere.

name: Dreaming Dodo Maid Cafe
description: The Dreaming Dodo is a SFW, RP friendly maid cafe with a laid back atmosphere. We have a number of maids and butlers, a variety of services, and live music to offer you a relaxing evening.

name: Tatsu Onsen
description: Tatsu Onsen is the largest shrine to Tatsugami! We value his views! As such we look to providing a place of comfort and fun! In this case we are a Bathhouse! We offer food and entertainment currently in the form of dances and cooking shows!

name: The Locker Room
description: A completely normal Locker Room, come on down and get changed in a place where privacy is definitely not guaranteed.
comments: I THINK the novel service is a sports talk show, based on the layout of the venue.

name: The Cat Girl Nightclub
description: CATS!
We've got courts, we've got dancers, we've got gamba and we've got drinks! What more could you need?!

name: Pogazu Pizza
description: Pogazu is the most unhinged (and longest running) pizza-related venue on Aether. Casual? pizza atmosphere where you can order quite literally anything on a pizza! Just don't ask for Namazu. The staff may serve you with a smile one moment, then threaten you with a flamethrower the next. It's the venue where everything's made up and the points don't matter!

name: Black Rose
description: Its a cozy little party venue with live music gambling and nsfw availabilities. as of right now we are in a small but our next order of business is to obtain a large which is set in stone not just being hopeful.

name: Mrs. Dawn's Bath House
description: Come and relax, chat, and pull each others ears at Mrs. Dawn's peaceful bath house! Open most days either at noon EST, or the 6pm EST; just check the PF! ♥️

name: Fiddlesticks' Funny Flat
description: The Funny Flat is my humble Eorzean comedy club crashpad, where I occasionally host a refreshing smoothie bowl service featuring flavors in customized combinations! Adventurers can wander in freely expecting a bountiful blend of lively banter peppered with puns and punchlines, along with other light-hearted, fruit-filled fare. Spoony bards, poets and aspiring stand-up comedians are welcome to hone their craft in my colorful sitting room, and all are invited to drop in for a giggle.

name: Purple Suit Casino and Lounge
description: The Purple Suit Casino and Lounge is a brand new entertainment venue opening to all on the Aether Data Center. We do our best to strive and offer a welcoming venue with fantastic services, all to create an open atmosphere to all friends and strangers, to gather and enjoy some drinks, play some games, win some gil, and most importantly—have plenty of fun.

name: La Veela
description: Tucked away on a scenic corner of the Goblet, La Veela lays in wait for you to come greet her! Enjoy a drink at the bar with our charismatic and loveable staff, gamble to your hearts content at the Blackjack table, dance until your feet go numb alongside our bard and dancers, maybe even find your destiny in the cards with our esteemed tarot reader! There is something for everyone here at La Veela and we can't wait to meet you.

name: The Kat's Meow
description: The Kat's Meow is a small cafe, for people looking for a quiet spot away from all the hustle and bustle of Eorzean life. We offer drinks (hot and cold), sweet treats, an open mic stage, a small library, and even tarot readings! Check out our menu, staff, and come in and see us!

name: Seaside Sunrise Maid & Butler Cafe
description: Come be our Guest at Seaside Sunrise, depending on the month we have themed services our Maids & Butlers can provide!
We have various activities, entertainment, dishes, and collector cards!
Please, be our Guest!
notices: This venue opens once a month, primarily on a Saturday or Sunday at 5pm - 11pm CST. Please check the discord for this venue's next opening.

name: Captain's Quarters Pub & Lounge
description: The Captain's Quarters is a place where the Captain loves to hang his hat and drink to his heart's content before setting out on his next adventure! Providing live entertainment, surprise drinks, awesome menu, and various other services you might stay and become part of the crew!
notices: This venue opens once a month on Fridays and Saturdays at 7pm - 1am CST. Please check the discord for this venue's next opening.

name: Afterglow
description: Afterglow is a beautifully decorated nightclub and casino with stunning and unique private rooms available for rent both with or without court services. Afterglow staff, the Glowsquad, pride themselves on guest services and our goal is that every guest leaves our venue glowing. Our main stage plays host to our resident DJ, Blkdrvgon who also hosts Afterglow After Hourz on Saturday mornings from 2am.

name: Kawaii Weeb Cafe
description: The Kawaii Weeb Cafe is a place to be kawaii. Only kawaii people are permitted to enter the kawaii space. We promise you will snack on kawaii foods, slurp up kawaii drinks, and enjoy kawaii music during your stay. All our staff are super kawaii, if they're not, you will be given all your kawaii money back. We hope you come and be kawaii with us. KAWAII.
Also we have a 2-way petting zoo.
location: Sargatanas, Lavender Beds, Ward 16 Sub, Apt 27

name: Sirens Song [Siren]
description: A relaxing aquarium/underwater themed, trance music, nightclub and casino.

name: The Siren's Song [Ada]
description: Allow our Sirens to cater to any and all needs, fantasies and lusts. We do it all, from the erotic to companionship, crafting and gathering assistance, and everything in between. Join us, and let my Sirens make your evening more delightful.

name: Eri's Baking Company
description: At Eri's we offer a small café experience with the calmness of a weekday night, and the comedy/unpredictability that is life itself, so when you walk into Eri's expect a relaxing atmosphere but don't be alarmed if suddenly people raid the venue and take the pastries, its just life 😁

name: The Frisky Kitten Cafe & Cabaret
description: The Frisky Kitten is a beautifully decorated beachside cafe with a downstairs cabaret open stage and an upstairs spa/bathhouse. The atmosphere is warm and cozy with a hint of sophistication.

name: Impulse
description: Welcome to impulse were an inclusive lgbtqia+ owned and operated venue. if you're looking for a place to enjoy great drinks, great people, GAMBA, or to just relax look no further. We are always ready to meet new friends and make connections. Open Wed/Thurs/Fri 8pm EST - 12am EST

name: The Azure Oasis
description: The unrelenting Thanalan heat and fast paced Ul'dahn city life can wear down any adventurer whether they're local or from afar. Nestled on the rim of the Goblet, the Azure Oasis is a shining beacon to all who need a break and cool off a while. Our bar is stocked with our prized exotic waters from across the globe blended and brewed with equally as exotic herbs to give each drink a life and personality of it's own. Many local delicacies and a large selection of incense also graces our menu. If you're looking for a place to drift away and relax a while (aside from occasional staff hijinks) there's none better.

name: V.I.T.R.I.O.L.
description: VITRIOL is a SFW +18, gothic/dark academia bar and lounge. We feature live music, occasional raffles and giveaways, and sometimes an open stage for wandering bards. We have dancers on staff, bartenders, and the occasional greeter. This is an RP casual venue, but RP is not required. Expected to be greeted when you walk downstairs, find a place to sit, and relax. Stay as long as you like~

name: Cabaret de Fufu
description: Cabaret de Fufu will be a cabaret style comedy club / restaurant / bar / concert / open-mic night kinda joint. The theme changes every week! Guests will experience a night of performance and fine dining; only the finest at Cabaret de Fufu. While the cabaret may be small, it will be packed full of life and merriment.
There will also be special services some nights, such as a tarot card reader.

name: The Wallflower Bar
description: The Wallflower is a small dance club and bar. We offer Drinks, Dancers Music and occasional raffles and cosplay contests. A chill hole in the wall atmosphere to meet new people or hang out with your friends.

name: Big Boys Sushi Bar
description: Derived from our Big Brother Goobbue's spirit of warmth & goofiness to coexist with plant life on them, the Big Boys Sushi Bar aims to create a symbiotic relationship with their patrons, much like the relationship with the moss and lichen growing atop a goobbue's head! We're a SFW cozy place with a splash of chaos to chill, get your fill, meet friends, and have fun! There's a wide selection of food and drinks available, friendly staff, relaxing bathhouse and a wild gambling master always ready for a death roll.
notices: This venue is open every OTHER Saturday night. Please check the venue's Discord for opening.

name: Third Tarot
description: Salutations! My name is Alex Alkett and I’m an apprentice tarot reader guiding others in a spiritual journey to elucidate any situational matter. My garden is an open and highly confidential space providing the utmost respectful experience. Offering premier tarot reading services, including three card spreads of multiple varieties and the Celtic Cross spread.

name: Alie's Wanderful Maid Café
description: A cute café with a blend of eastern and western themes. Small, comfortable private rooms sit above a more open space that encourages mingling. Our cute maids are eager to ease your troubles and serve you delightful treats.

name: Hyakkaou Popoto Academy
description: HPA is a SFW casino themed as a school. Our goal is to provide a comfy atmosphere for those that enjoy gambling. Whether thats partaking in games in our classrooms or hanging out at the cafeteria. We strive to provide a wholesome environment to all of our guests.

name: Club Nix
description: Club Nix offers a wide variety of entertainment from Skilled NSFW Role Play Courtesans as well as equally talented SFW Role Play Dances, DJ's to Weekly Themed Contests & Raffles - we even have some of our own IN HOUSE entertainers like:

🕺 Performances by The Nix Troupe 🕺 Incredible Macro Dancing by a team of trained Dancers who put their all into the art of their performances; offering a wide variety of musical arrangements by Artists we all love! Be sure to tune in at https://cytu.be/r/TheNix

🎼 Live Bard Performances by Kristlyn Brianne & the Twilight Moon Quintet 🎼  Ensemble group of bards supplying you with some of the sickest tunes to bee's knee's to before the night gets wild! They play a wide range of musical styles to suit everyone's music itch! www.twilight-moon.net

name: The Last Request
description: 'The Last Request' is an open RP Tavern for adventurers' from all walk are welcome to come and relax.

name: ILLUSION
description: ILLUSION is an LGBTQIA+ 18+ venue which was made to make everyone feel welcomed from RP'ers to gamblers to people who miss clubbing IRL and want to get lit to some music and throw it back.

name: Euphoria
description: Euphoria is a weekend nightclub and event space located in the heart of Shirogane. Featuring a fully stocked bar, hot tub, dance floor and casino, we’re sure to offer a night to remember. With both SFW and NSFW services offered, there's something to satisfy everyone! Stop by for an unforgettable evening and enter a state of euphoria.

name: Duskrose Inn
description: Duskrose Inn is a themed classic-style luxury inn. We strive for an atmosphere that's comforting and relaxing to either wind down for the night, or spend time with others in a calm environment. Listen to talented bards on our open stage, take a dip in our tubs, or spend some quality time in our private couples' or group rooms!

name: Broceliande
description: Broceliande is a quiet, immersive RP venue with a blend of Hingan and Gridanian aesthetics and a large menu. We encourage in-character conversation as much as possible. Most visitors come to unwind and have a little light character writing. The intent is to provide a relaxing environment for adult players to interact with other adults, and to facilitate the formation of connections with other immersive RPers so that they can form their own bonds and playgroups.

name: Kokuryuu
description: An immersive Eastern-themed high-end restaurant and lounge focusing on cuisine from the Near and Far East. We offer light conversation and an elegant atmosphere to meet up with friends or make new ones as adventurers in Eorzea and beyond.

name: The Ethereal Star
description: We are open 1am to 6am eastern time every day with the exclusion of Monday Mornings and Thursday mornings.

name: Blessed Heaven
description: Blessed Heaven is an 18+ softcore RP venue, that will offer a variety of services! we have lovely and welcoming staff ready to give you an unforgettable time. So, please come and enjoy your stay provided courtesy by the Bless Brother's. \o/

name: Wetflix
description: Wetflix Movie lounge with TVs (safely) installed on the edge of hot tubs so patrons can soak while watching movies, TV shows, twitch streams or YouTube videos.
(Wetflix is available to rent)

name: Wet & Wild Spa Resort
description: Rustic/Oriental themed bath house with full soak tubs (to /doze in), showerbeds, hot tubs to soak in and a watery dance floor and bar. Owner gives out free chocolates to every patron upon entry. Nail salon is available in venue for manicures and pedicures.

name: Shonen
description: We are the friendliest venue on Sargatanas! We pride ourselves on keeping an all welcoming and happy atmosphere! Shonen is a great place to meet new friends and enjoy fun new venue events! The venue is named after the Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine which introduced us to some of the greatest Anime to date! Much like the magazine has one of the longest-running communities, we hope to build an atmosphere around gathering those who are like minded and anime loving!
You can look forward to refreshing new venue events and activities like:
- Surprise maid service (starting at 20k)
- Glam competitions
- Gamba
- Trivia
- Themed anime nights
- SURPISE OPENINGS (with more surprises)
- 18+ services
- 24/7 anime bard performance (other then for special DJ anime nights)
We look forward to meeting everyone and hope you enjoy our venue as much as we do hosting for you!

name: Ethereal Memories Photography
description: Ethereal Memories is the place where dreams are captured behind a lens and kept for eternity's moment. Please come and join us and put any side on display, they're all your best side. If by chance you wish for more than a memento of your time with us, please feel more than free to indulge in our array of fine food and drink, or perhaps our gaming table if the sweet taste of victory is more to your liking. For those who wish to leave it all behind, our dance floor is the best place to pretend nobody is watching. With our photo booths changing like the phases of the moon, we promise to always show you our best on display. May that you leave here with your spirits higher than the sky and walk evermore under the light of the stars.
notices: This venue is open every OTHER Sunday night. Please check the venue's Discord for opening.

name: Champagne Room
description: Champagne Room is Aether's most intimate dance lounge. CR offers a live pianist, premiere bard bands, courtesans, SFW dancers, gambling, and an extensive bar. Champagne Room was created as a mature and relaxing establishment to visit when you want to wind down from the other clubs.

name: Kolat
description: If venues had a soundtrack, Kolat's would be a mix of music’s past, present, and future with cuts of different genre's all blending in perfect harmony. Explore the Kolat Nightlife, see a Kolat Show, and dive into Kolat’s diverse entertainment offerings. With music and entertainment around every corner, friends and family can enjoy the sounds that make this club your nighttime destination.

What’s your pleasure? At Kolat, you will find an intoxicating variety games and denominations, friendly dealers and a stylishly exotic – yet always comfortable – atmosphere that will enhance every experience. Fast, hostess service makes it easier to concentrate on your next move. New to gambling? There’s no reason to be intimidated by the action… our gambits are happy to show you how each game works and soon, you’ll be playing like a pro.

Kolat gives way to many quality entertainers in a relaxing and exotic atmosphere that you could almost call home. The Aether LB locale packs the house with the steamiest entertainers in the land. In house is a VIP area, with a view of the large main stage. And let's not forget that the VIP packages offer quality entertainer discounts.

name: Pinto's Art Cafe
description: A cozy café with hired artists who draw character portraits live on Twitch during venue hours. The menu is a mix of comfort foods and coffees with some alcoholic options to suit the late-night hours.

name: Cho's Cafe
description: Thank you for taking your coffee break with Cho's Cafe! And for supporting an independently-owned and managed company. Cho's Cafe was founded in 2022 with the dream of serving great tasting specialty coffee, tea and snacks to everyone in a welcoming environment. Since the beginning days of working behind the bar at our first location in Goblet to present day. Cho's Cafe have always been hands-on and devoted to making this company the best it can be. Cho's Cafe has a goal which is to share coffee, tea and snacks with as many people as possible and make sure that if you come in grumpy, you leave happy!

name: Seventh Gate
description: Aether’s alternative venue. Featuring Metal, Punk, Emo, and Rock music from live DJs. As well as a gambling, a fully stocked bar, courtesans, and a friendly staff.

name: Ink Nightclub
description: Our exclusive nightclub experience offers some of the top live DJs on Aether, stacked VIP packages, giveaways and theme nights galore, and a full casino floor. High roller and learning nights are available for Blackjack on the regular. Customize your experience with our entertainers, photography, and tarot readings. Think of something you want and don't see it? Ask and we'll see what we can do to fulfill your wildest dreams.

name: Ink Icehouse
description: Enjoy a night out in our unique Icehouse. From trivia nights to battling bartenders, to chill beats, to elite gambling, the Icehouse has something for everyone. We have rooms available for rent, including a custom BDSM rental. Courts, tarot readings, and photography are also available. Let us be your home away from home.

name: Otter by the Water
description: Otter by the Water is a café on Jenova... or, as we like to call it, a cAFKé! Whether you're looking to kill time in a queue, want a SFW place to roleplay, trying to take some cute /gposes in a cozy setting, or just need a place to chill, we've got you covered. We're located in the Mist housing district at Ward 7, Plot 4, close to the docks and Mist South aetheryte. Look for the odder otters decorating the exterior—you can't miss it!

name: Waffle House Lounge
description: Cafe and Lounge serving brunch and cocktails. Our rambunctious and chaotic servers are here to share our love of waffles and enjoy a good time with our patrons!

name: Ara Au'ra
description: A quaint little friendly bar for all to come relax, have a drink and mingle with all.

name: Malefic
description: A laid back club with high class flair, Malefic is the perfect spot to let loose a little and ramp up for the weekend. We offer wonderful court services, gambling, an open bar, and live music hosted by an in-house DJ specializing in alternative rock and metal genres. We also offer VIP services for the ultimate night and access to high-stakes gambling for those looking for a bit more risk.

name: The Kingdom
description: A venue that was made to give DJ’s a place to just cut loose and do whatever they’d like and it was also built and decorated by other DJ’s. Just a fun environment with minimal staff to just focus on music and fun.

name: Repose
description: A cozy little cafe in the hearts of the Empyreum.
Come in and enjoy warm snacks and hot drinks.

name: Requiem
description: Come and sacrifice your sins here at Requiem and enjoy the greatest of all the 7 sins~! Currently we offer our sfw event, "Sacrifice the Lala!" It's just like amongus, but in ffxiv! Our NSFW event is "Never Have I Ever"! We have a high stakes and low stakes casino, offering Blackjack, Deathrolls and Satan's Dice!

name: TARTARUS
description: TARTARUS is Aethers HOTTEST vampiric/goth night club and safe haven for the vampiric kind but.. if you are one of those mortals who always wanted to see the dark and wild side of our world, why not stop by?
We have a fully loaded bar with that of which you only will see upon entering our little realm. Need a hot night? Maybe a little love from our courts of the night, why not ask one?

Blood Raves, sacrifices? Yes... we have them. Care for some good music while you dance the night or your mortal life away? Leave it to our mistress and DJ Hilde and they will show you the rhythm of the night.
Beware the night or embrace it, the choice is yours.

name: Hazel's Herbs
description: Hosting an RP experience like no other, Hazel's Herbs allows you to immerse yourself in the world of Final Fantasy XIV just that little bit more. Featuring a cute Miqo'te witch who wants nothing more than to sell her unique collection of flowers, herbs, potions, and salves, this shop aims to be a wholesome pitstop for those in the RP community. I essentially want to aim for great rp experiences where if a mishap occurs, both customers and I can build off it for the next time they are in.
